title: Downtown Apartment Kitchen Update
description: Complete overhaul of a compact apartment kitchen, focusing on maximizing space and light. Included custom cabinetry, quartz countertops, and integrated appliances.
altTexts: Modern compact kitchen with white cabinets and wood accents
Detail of quartz countertop and undermount sink

title: Master Bath Spa Retreat
description: Transformation of a dated master bathroom into a luxurious spa-like retreat featuring a freestanding tub, walk-in shower with rain head, and double vanity.
altTexts: Spacious master bathroom with freestanding tub and double vanity
Walk-in shower with custom tilework and rain shower head
